name: MEC All Day Essentials Seamless Y-Not Bra - Women's
categories: All Day Essentials Seamless Y-Not Bra
description:
The next generation of our popular Y Not Bra, this seamless sports bra offers adjustable light support for travel and everyday wear. Plus, it's made with a high recycled content so you can feel good about your helping to reduce textile waste.Made of soft, moisture wicking blend of nylon (some recycled content) and spandex.Sizes cover a larger range than other MEC garments, thanks to super-stretchy material. Please refer to our size chart to find your size.Flattering Y-shaped back with adjustable straps fits a variety of cup sizes.Internal cup pockets let you add inserts (not included).Includes mesh bag for washing and packing.

        Sustainability
